name: Cheetos
description: Snack brand owned by PepsiCo
reason: The owner of Cheetos, PepsiCo, bought SodaStream for $3.2bn and owns 50% of Sabra both of which had taken advantage of the Israeli occupation of Palestine.
howToBoycott: Don't work for the PepsiCo Company

name: Nestle
description: Nestle is the largest public food company in the world.
reason: Osem is an israeli food manufacturer which operates in Occupied Palestine. Nestle owns a controlling stake in Osem.
howToBoycott: Avoid Nestle products until they divest all operations in Occupied Palestine.
Especially avoid any Osem brands such as Sabra Salads and others which can be found via the wikipedia page in the source.

name: La Mer
description: Cosmetics company, owned by Estee Lauder.
reason: La Mer is owned by Estee Lauder, who's ownership, especially Ronald Lauder, has extremist zionist views and financially and politically supports Israeli occupation of Palestinian land.
howToBoycott: Dont buy products from the vast catalogue of Estee Lauder.
Brands include MAC cosmetics, Clinique, Bobbi Brown, Jo Malone, La Mer, Tom Ford Beauty and many more.
Don't work for Estee Lauder brands.

name: BAE Systems
description: BAE Systems is a weapons manufacturer based in the UK.

howToBoycott: Book directly with businesses. They usually offer discounts and similar terms for direct bookings.
Don't list your services on Cheapflights.
